title: Community Ideas
ptext: Anura community members share their ideas for new protocol-driven applications with the development team. Any member can participate.

title: Open Project Planning
ptext: Members of the development team whiteboard project ideas in open voice channels with the community to iron out action items.

title: Official Proposal
ptext: Project details are finalized with the development team and an official proposal is put up for a community vote. All members holding governance may vote.
